releaseNotes: ✨ **Animated Icons System**: Premium Lottie animations throughout the app
🕒 **Animated Clock**: Work timer now features smooth animated clock instead of static timer
🔥 **Animated Fire**: Overtime mode displays animated fire for visual impact
🔔 **Smart Notification Bell**: Custom SVG bell that animates when notifications arrive
⏰ **Enhanced Timer**: Countdown from full shift duration (7h day / 8h night shifts)
🎯 **Improved UX**: Animations only show after actions (check-in/check-out completion)
📱 **Better Visual Feedback**: Gold notification bell when messages are waiting
🚀 **Performance Optimized**: Smooth 60fps animations with fallback to static icons
